QuestData.Title: Grisly Grizzlies
QuestData.Description: Have you seen the plagued bruins that wander to the west of here? Those hides... so hideous, so diseased, so... perfect!$b$bFetch me 5 of them. I've got an idea for an anti-Scourge poison that's guaranteed to succeed!
QuestData.CompletionText: Let's see... do you have enough hides?
QuestData.RewardText: Dithers, you've done it again! These are perfect.
